title: Tandem Flight
description: Our base service. Fly with a professional instructor from the highest peaks.
details: Available at various european locations. Duration from 15 to 45 minutes.

title: Photo & Video
description: Thrilling flight footage to preserve your memories forever.
details: Professional 4K aerial and handheld footage. Ready within 24 hours.

title: Gift Certificates
description: The best gift is an emotion. Give unforgettable experiences.
details: Digital or physical certificates with personalized design.

title: Training Courses
description: Start your paragliding journey with our expert instructors.
details: Courses for beginners and advanced flyers with certification.
